attributes.action: Ensure that all national insurance payees receive their fair share of benefits should they require them, ie ESA & JSA regardless of their savings and private pension status or let them pay less NI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All NI payess should be entitled to receive ESA & JSA regadless of what other income they are receiving be it from investments or from business as they are fully contributing through their NI contributions.At present they are penalised if they receive a private or occupational sentence or have meagre saving over £6000. They are soley contributing to the benefit of others.
This must surely be the utmost in discrimination.
